metadata.title: CVE-2018-20178 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Readin the function process_demand_active() that results in a Denial of Service(segfault).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.8.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
